bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and Apparatus For Monitoring and Responding to Land Use Activities

abstract.p: The invention provides a method and apparatus for monitoring the use of land. More specifically, the invention monitors the use of land at a specified site, as well as at adjacent sites. The invention answers the question of how to manage risks resulting from external activities and how to intervene proactively.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and apparatus for monitoring and responding to land use activities

abstract.p: The invention provides a method and apparatus for monitoring the use of land. More specifically, the invention monitors the use of land at a specified site, as well as at adjacent sites. The system continuously receives new land use data, The system identifies land use events at the specified site and filters these monitoring hits against alert criteria. The system then generates alerts to specified parties. Based on these alerts, proactive steps of intervention can be undertaken. The invention answers the question of how to manage risks relating to the use of land resulting from external activities and how to intervene proactively.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and apparatus for monitoring and responding to land use activities

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING AND RESPONDING TO LAND USE ACTIVITIES
PROCEDE ET APPAREIL PERMETTANT DE SURVEILLER LES ACTIVITES D'EXPLOITATION DU TERRAIN ET DE REAGIR A CES ACTIVITES

nplcit.text: US ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY INSTITUTIONAL CONTROLS TRACKING SYSTEM 08 October 2002,
INDIA: CALL FOR APPROPRIATE DATA BASES FOR LAND USE 02 June 1997,

abstract.p: The invention provides a method and apparatus for monitoring the use of land. More specifically, the invention monitors the use of land at a specified site, as well as at adjacent sites. The system continuously receives new land use data, The system identifies land use events at the specified site and filters these monitoring hits against alert criteria. The system then generates alerts to specified parties. Based on these alerts, proactive steps of intervention can be undertaken. The invention answers the question of how to manage risks relating to the use of land resulting from external activities and how to intervene proactively.

L'invention concerne un procédé et un appareil permettant de surveiller l'exploitation du terrain, et plus spécifiquement à surveiller l'exploitation du terrain dans un site spécifié, ainsi que dans des sites adjacents. Ce système reçoit en continu de nouvelles données d'exploitation du terrain, et identifie des événements d'exploitation de terrain dans les sites indiqués, et filtre ces occurences en les comparant à des critères d'alerte. Le système génère ensuite des alertes à l'intention de parties spécifiées, ces alertes permettant la prise de mesures d'intervention proactives. Ce procédé et cet appareil apportent une solution au problème consistant à déterminer comment gérer les risques liés à l'exploitation du terrain résultant d'activités externes, et comment intervenir de manière proactive.
